prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent:
### 8. Limit Meetings

Limit the number of meetings and ensure that each one has a clear purpose and agenda. Meetings should be used for essential discussions only, as they can be time-consuming.

prompt.content:
You are experienced data researcher, detect the important keywords in the document.

# Rules

-   Write just keywords separated by comma

# The document

Take information from this document:

> {knowledgePieceContent}

promptResult.content: Limit meetings, clear purpose, agenda, essential discussions, time-consuming
